title: NT Wright and Douglas Murray on Unbelievable, Salt and Light Part 1
description:
NT Wright and Douglas Murray met on Justin Brierley's @Unbelievable? just a few days before the big conference and it was a terrific conversation. I only had time to treat the conversation proper here. I'll work on the Q/A section next week. 

@Unbelievable? https://youtu.be/VN8OUi9MF7w
